articles.title: Spain approves "period pain" law allowing women to take medical leave - CBS News
articles.description: Spain becomes the first European Union country to pass menstrual health legislation.
articles.content:
Spanish women suffering from "period pain" will now be able to take medical leave, guaranteed by a new government law – the first European country to do so – passed on Thursday.
